Stanton is located at the intersection of Beach Boulevard and Katella Avenue. The intersection is south of Knott's Berry Farm on Beach Boulevard, and west of Disneyland on Katella Avenue.
Stanton is small and can easily be navigated by car or
buses. However, the only tourist attractions (see below) are on Beach Boulevard.

value: content=Not much compared to Disney or Knott's, but worth a try.
, located next door to Adventure City, is bound to bring back classic memories.

, 10350 Beach Blvd, PH: (714) 995-1534. Looking for some live adult entertainment? This isn't the cleanest, classiest joint in Orange County, but it will do the trick.
(see above). Nearly 20 different arts and crafts stores, selling everything from Native American crafts to homemade toys and the like.
Most of the best hotels in Orange County are in Buena Park and Anaheim, but some cheaper accommodations can be found in Stanton.

value: Travel west on Katella Avenue until it crosses over into Los Angeles County and becomes Willow Street.
Travel east on Katella Avenue - Disney's California Adventure will be visible to the left.
Travel south on Beach Boulevard and you will eventually see the ocean right in front of you.
